oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: US gas mask bag and mask
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This is a typical US issued gas mask and gas mask bag. With the introduction of gas warfare in 1915, the armies of the world required protection against the poisionous vapors. The American gas mask was carried in the bag on the center of the chest. In the event of a gas attack, the mask was placed over the face while the canister remained in the bag.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
